data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample source, sample source ID, and sample use variable associated with participants involved in the "Predicting Chemotherapy-Induced Mucositis with Genetic and Clinical Factors" project.

variable.name: source_sampid
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
